alert.note: Alert for Johnson County Higher Elevations; Newton County Higher Elevations; Southern Johnson County (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 27 at 1:48AM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Newton and Johnson Counties through 215 AM CST... At 147 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles northeast of Cass to Ozark. Movement was northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Clarksville... Hartman... Woodland... Walnut... Devils Knob... Coal Hill... Oak Grove in Johnson County... Mossville... Salus... Catalpa... Harmony... Yale... Friley... Ozone... Fallsville... Union City... Oark... Dixon Ridge... Hunt... Wolf Pen Campground... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Johnson County Higher Elevations; Newton County Higher Elevations; Southern Johnson County
